local_intent: Perceive white_plate, approach and align, execute Pick using grasp_white_plate, verify grasp stability and object in gripper.
assumptions: grasp_white_plate blackboard key exists (produced earlier by ComputeGraspPose)
white_plate is detectable by perception at this pose
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase from the global BT: detects the white plate, aligns, performs Pick with the precomputed grasp, and verifies success; consistent with the global stepwise plan and task description.
